title: Logical Quotient Test
description: Evaluate your logical reasoning and problem-solving ability.

questions.question: If 5 workers take 5 days to build 5 houses, how many days would 10 workers take to build 10 houses?
Which number comes next in the sequence? 2, 6, 12, 20, 30, ?
If all Bloops are Razzies and all Razzies are Lazzies, then all Bloops are definitely Lazzies?
Find the odd one out: Dog, Cat, Rabbit, Carrot
A clock shows the time as 3:15. What is the angle between the hour and minute hand?
